availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Ruggles (Carroll County, Kentucky, silversmith and hotel keeper)

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, silversmith and hotel keeper. New York native. Son of Harlo Ruggles and Mariah Ruggles. Married to Lizzie Ruggles. Father of Lilly B. Ruggles. Resident of Livingston County, Kentucky, in 1850. Silversmith in Carroll County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, New York, Livingston County, Mount Morris, p. 67. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Carrollton, District 2, p. 9. KYR-0001-029-0598.
